title: COME LIVE AT HARDY OAKS PLACE!!!!!
posting_body: ['Contact info:', 'Leasing Office|', 'show contact info', 'A HIGHER STANDARD OF LIVING', '915 Tidwell Houston, TX 77022', '$885/mo', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Year Built:', '1969', 'Sq Footage:', '665 sqft.', 'Bedrooms:', '1 Beds', 'Bathrooms:', '1 Bath', 'Lease Duration:', '1 Year (See Details Below)', 'Deposit:', '$200', 'Pets Policy:', 'NO PETS', 'Laundry:', 'ON-SITE LAUNDRY FACILITY', 'Parking:', 'OFF STREET PARKING', 'Property Type:', 'Apartment', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Hardy Oaks Place Apartments Homes offer something for every lifestyle.', 'Secluded from the rush of everyday living, but close enough to the Hardy Toll Road and Interstate 45, so you will not miss a beat.', 'We are sure to exceed your expectations.', 'You are going to love the bright open one, two and three bedroom floorplans.', 'Imaginatively designed to feature urban brick accents, wood plank flooring, spacious closets, breakfast bars, a separate pantry and custom back splash really promote Hardy Oaks Place Apartment Homes to a higher standard of living.', '.', 'RENTAL FEATURES', 'BREAKFAST BAR', 'CARPET & TILE FLOORS', 'PANTRY View', 'LARGE OPEN FLOORPLANS', 'COMMUNITY FEATURES', 'GATED COMMUNITY', '>', 'ON CALL MAINTENANCE', '>', 'TREE LINED COURTYARD', '>', 'LAUNDRY CENTER', 'LEASE TERMS', '7-12 month lease contracts', 'Contact info:', 'On-Site Professional Office Staff', 'show contact info', '<URL>']
